name: Codename:NASIRO
description:
The earth is under attack and you are makind's last hope! 

Destroy the alien fleet in this homeage to a retro classic.

Hours of fun for the whole family!

To run this game you need to be running Windows 7 SP1 or later.

If you like this game please make a donation, to help fund future game development costs, and don't forget to leave a comment on this page.
